column4: Am I likely to encounter any major problems with 64bit 12.04?
no, I think pretty much everyone is on the 64-bit boat by now... that was not the situation 2-3 years ago, but I think today it's pretty safe
yeah the architectures are named kind of after whichever was the first implementation. I wish the terminology was just "32-bit" and "64-bit" or something myself, to avoid these questions
